documentation.text:
@notice Shut down the gauge.
 @dev Accrued inflation can still be claimed from the gauge after shutdown.

claimRewards(address,uint256).notice: Claim rewards with an epoch up to which they should be claimed specified.

params.endEpoch: Epoch up to which to claim rewards.

kill().details: Accrued inflation can still be claimed from the gauge after shutdown.

reportFees(address,uint256,address).details: lpTokenAddress is included for forward compatibility with a single gauge solution.
reportFees(address,uint256,address).notice: Report fees generated by a keeper (this is the basis for inflation accrual).

params.amount: Amount of fees (in lp tokens) earned.
params.beneficiary: Address of the keeper who earned the fees.
params.lpTokenAddress: Address of the lpToken in which the fees are paid.
